name: LIQUID GOLD CELL QUENCH
description:
LIQUID GOLD CELL QUENCH ™ TREATMENT SERUM 
by Beauty Engineer® Mary Schook

Cell Quench Plant Stem Cell Complex is like food for the Cells. Liquid Gold safely gives your skin everything it needs and leaves out what it doesn’t.  
Hydrate, nourish, renew and support your body’s largest organ with Liquid Gold Cell Quench ™ Concentrate!

Free of 
-Perfumes
-Dyes
-Parabens
-Oil 
-Phthalates
-Sodium Lauryl Sulfates
-Petrolium
-Silicone

Vegan –Friendly
Safe for all skin types

INGREDIENTS: Glycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf (Certified Organic), Plant Stem Cell Callus Culture, Sodium Hyaluronate, Niacinimide (B3), Calcium D-Pantothenate (B5), Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vit C), Tocopheryl  Acetate (E), Pyridoxine Hydrochoride (B6), Maltodextrin, Sodium Starch Octenylsuccinate, Silica

Net Wt 10 ml


Made in the USA

Distributed by Beauty By Mary Schook, LLC
36 East 23rd street
New York, NY 10010
www.msapothecary.com
Twitter: @beauty212

Directions: Roll a very thin layer directly onto cleansed, damp skin.
Massage skin with clean hands until formula is absorbed. Can be used once or twice daily.
Daytime use: Super Antioxidant
Nightime use: Repair/ Restore

Keep bottle out of heat and direct sunlight. Optimum storage temperatures 39-45 degrees Farenheight. 



Cell Quench is preserved in violet glass to protect the formula from light that destroys sensitive ingredients. Violet glass also enhances ingredients by allowing only beneficial light to pass through the glass. 



Liquid Gold Cell Quench Tips:
Mist skin and repeat steps if skin remains tacky or any residue is still present. Residue means too much product has been applied. 
Please keep in mind Cell Quench is a concentrate and little goes a long way. 
Cell Quench can be used both AM and PM. 
Cell Quench is fantastic with high frequency or other skincare devices. 
Cell Quench is so nourishing it can be used as a replacement to your serum and cream.
Add additional serum to areas with pigmentation to reduce the appearance of spots or discoloration.

PHOTO BY SAMUEL BRISTOW

name: Custom Eco Palm Wax Candles: 2-3 Day Turnaround!
description:
100% Palm Wax Candles! Hand-poured in Vermont. Each Vermont made, hand poured candle slowly melts (tunnels) into itself as it burns, creating the perfect holder for a tea light. The carving actually illuminates as it burns down. Our signature tunnel burn means the carved candle is yours to enjoy for years to come. It's the perfect keepsake!

Custom carved out of 100% palm wax, all cotton wick and scented with 100% all natural essential oils.

***Note at checkout (via paypal) state the initials you would like carved and select font style to customize your order. If you have any questions please email msapothecary@yahoo(dot)com ***

Presented in gift-ready clear acetate box. Candle measures 3" x 3" x 3" or 4"x 4"x 4". 

Ships UPS in 2-3 days.

3" palm wax candle monogram fonts: AMIENNE, TIMES NEW ROMAN, FRENCH SCRIPT, VINE, ROSEYLN, ROMAN, CIRCLE, DIAMOND, 

3" palm wax candle name or phrase fonts: ARIAL, AMIENNE, FRENCH SCRIPT, GREYHOUND SCRIPT, LUCIDA, TIMES ROMAN
Line 1- up to eight letters
Line 2- up to eight letters

4" palm wax candle monogram fonts: AMIENNE, TIMES ROMAN, BLOCK, NATURAL, FRENCH SCRIPT, VINE, ROSEYLN, ROMAN, CIRCLE, DIAMOND, 
Three letters.

4" palm wax candle name or phrase fonts: ARIAL, AMIENNE, FRENCH SCRIPT, GREYHOUND SCRIPT, LUCIDA, TIMES ROMAN
Line 1- up to 10 letters
Line 2 (optional)- up to 10 letters
Line 3 (optional)- up to 8 letters

name: GREEN BODY GREEN PLANET COLOR SAFE SHAMPOO
description:
ADD BODY AND FULLNESS to your hair with our professional salon formula of plant extracts, balancing oils and gentle cleansers. Organic Grapefruit Seed, Rosemary, and Chamomile balance and stimulate your scalp, providing a healthy environment for hair to grow while Organic Horsetail Herb and Burdock Root  bring back intense shine -leaving your hair vibrant, youthful and full of life.

8FL oz

INGREDIENTS :
Aqua (Purified Water), BIO ECO-NUTRIENT COMPLEX: (Certified Organic Herbal Blend of Rosa Rubiginosa (*Rosehip), Anthemis Nobilis (*Chamomile), Lavandula Angustifolia (*Lavender), Equisetum Arvense (*Horsetail Herb), Tagetes Erecta (*Marigold), Arctium Lappa (*Burdock Root), Helianthus Annuus (*Sunflower) Oil, Citrus Grandis (*Grapefruit) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (*Rosemary) Extract, Persea Gratissima (**Avocado) Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia (**Macadamia) Oil, *Lotus Bean Gum, Terminalia Ferdinandiana (Australian Bush Kakadu Plum) Extract): Decyl Polyglucose, Cocoglucose, Aloe Barbadensis (*Aloe Vera) Extract, Soy Lecithin, Sativa protein (Oatmeal Protein), Simmondsia Chinensis (*Jojoba) Oil,  Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Extract (Vitamin C), *Glycerin (Vegetable), Biotin (Vitamin B7), Urtica Dioica (Stinging Nettle), Trifolium Pratense (***Red Clover) Oil, d-Alpha Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary Oil), Cananga Odorata (Ylang Ylang Oil, Geranium Maculatum (Geranium Oil), Hydroxy Methylglycinate (mild preservative).

*Certified Organic **Certified Biodynamic ***Wildcrafted

Decyl Polyglucose, Cocoglucose - Our Sulphate Free plant based surfactant (cleansing agent) is low on the list so you receive the highest concentration of beneficial ingredients from our BIO ECO-NUTRIENT COMPLEX - a blend of 13 Certified Organic Plant Extracts and Oils! This combination provides a rich, creamy, chemical free lather not found in most organic shampoos.


TOXIN FREE- SILICONE FREE - ALCOHOL FREE- CRUELTY FREE- VEGAN- BIODEGRADABLE

name: PURE INVENTIONS HAIR+SKIN+NAILS
description:
Tonic may help lash growth, promote supple skin, and promote full hair.

Pure Inventions Hair + Skin + Nails Beauty Formula - 2 oz. (60 mL)

Pure Inventions Hair + Skin + Nails Beauty Formula is designed to help support and maintain healthy hair, skin and nails. This delicious liquid formula allows for optimal absorption of these nutrients. This delicious tasting, all-natural liquid extract does not contain:

    Sugar
    Calories
    Caffeine
    Stimulants
    Gluten
    Sodium
    Artificial Sweeteners

Pure Inventions Ingredients Include:

    Vitamin C - powerful antioxidant that may promote healthy skin.
    Biotin - for healthy hair, skin and nails, may help to improve skin firmness.
    Horsetail Extract - contains the highest known content of silicon of any herb that may promote new hair growth.
    Inositol - may promote strong healthier hair.
    L-Methionine - may benefit skin tone and elasticity, nails and hair.
    L-Cysteine - supports hair and nail tissue.

About Pure Inventions

Pure Inventions is the creation of lifelong friends Lynne Gerhards and Lori Mulligan both Certified Clinical Nutritionists and Nutritional Consultants. Founded in 2003, Pure Inventions is the true pioneer of nutritional, liquid supplements in the beauty industry and a trendsetter in the healthy lifestyle industry. The history of Pure Inventions parallels the growth of nutritional awareness in the United States and across the world. Lori and Lynee started their practice of clinical counseling in nutrition and soon became very aware of the increasing need for healthy alternative beverage choices. Combining their knowledge of nutrition with the science of liquid supplements they decided to develop their own line, thus Pure Inventions was born.

The main goal of developing Pure Inventions was to achieve the wellness of the whole person in a way that was easy, convenient and would be simple to incorporate into a hectic lifestyle. All of the product lines in the Pure Inventions collection are delicious tasting, all natural, fully standardized, and have no calories, no caffeine, no artificial sweeteners, no preservatives or alcohol and are gluten-free. The delivery system is eco-friendly and convenient. Just add to your favorite water for high antioxidant hydration. When we supple our bodies with the proper nutrients, diet and exercise we achieve balance in our bodies and in our lives. We can then achieve our highest aspirations of health, wellness, and peak performance.

name: UBERLUBE- 50ML
description:
Use überlube for Sex, Style, and Sport. 

High performance, long lasting, fantastic finish. 

Did you know that überlube is used by salons as a brilliant smoothing, finishing, and anti-frizz product?

Or that athletes use überlube for running, biking and swimming to eliminate chaffing? 

Not just a lube, überlube loves your whole body. Long-lasting and can be used as unscented massage oil too. 

The leak-proof bottle and top keeps überlube in and dust out. Clear bottle lets you see the purity. 

Precision formulated from the finest available ingredients. Made only from silicone and vitamin E. No parabens. No cyclopentasiloxane. 3rd party batch-tested to ensure quality standards.

 Überlube is the result of hundreds of iterations of formula and years of extensive field-testing. American made by Überlube in Chicago. Überlube is packaged in Type 1 borosilicate glass. A special durable glass used for high stress applications in chemical laboratories, telescope mirrors, aquarium heaters, and thermal insulation tiles on the Space Shuttle. 

Acid resistant, shatter resistant, heat resistant. It can be put directly over flame. Sanitary. The non-porous surface means bacteria can't hide anywhere. Clinically recommended.

name: JOANNA VARGAS VITAMIN C FACE WASH- FREE SHIPPING
description:
A gentle exfoliating face wash to remove surface impurities and dead cells. Leaves the skin refreshed and luminous. For all skin types.

We like it mostly because it is perfect for eyelash extensions because it won't interfere with the glue.

A little goes a long way. 

4FL oz

INGREDIENTS:
Water (Agua), Decyl Glucoside, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Hamamelis (Witch Hazel), Carboxymethyl Cellulose, Gluconolactone, Sodium Benzoate, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai) Juice, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Hyaluronic Acid, Galactoarabinan, Polysorbate 80, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxide, Mica, D-Limonene.

name: JOANNA VARGAS EXFOLIATING MASK- FREE SHIPPING!
description:
A gentle enzymatic scrub to be used twice a week. Contains volcanic ash to gently scrub away impurities in the skin. The pineapple enzyme coupled with kojic acid lighten and brighten the skin every time you use it. 

We love it at M.S. Apothecary because it is gentle, brightening and effective without drying. 

2Fl oz


INGREDIENTS:
Water (Agua), Kaolin Clay, Volcanic Rock (Purnice), Glycerine (vegetable Derived), Saccharum Officinarum (Sugar Cane) Extract, Vaccinium Myrtillus (Bilberry) Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Acer Saccharinum (Sugar Maple) Extract, Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Galactoarabinan, Bromelain (Pineapple Enzyme), Hyaluronic Acid, Tapioca Starch, Lactic Acid, Lactose, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxide, Gluconolactone, Sodium Benzoate, Xanthan Gum, Carboxymethyl Cellulose, Triethyl Citrate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Lavandula Hybrida Oil, Cananga Odorata Flower Oil, D-Limonene.
